media:group.media:title: Why Everyone Should Play OMORI
media:group.media:description:
In today's video essay, we are exploring the Indie PC cult hit, Omori, a game with heavy emotional themes, and a likeness tied to the Mother series. And I believe it is a game that everyone should play in their lives.


Skip 15:00 to 19:49 for no spoilers!!!



CREDITS:

“Let’s Get Together Now!” - OMORI

“Lost Library” - OMORI

“Poems in the Fog” - OMORI
“Lost, Then Found” - OMORI
“By Your Side” - Citadel
